doctor.name: Prof. Dr. Noor Islam
doctor.info: Prof. Dr. Noor Islam is a Gastroenterologist in Rangpur. His qualification is MBBS, FCPS (Medicine), FACP (USA), MD (Gastroenterology). He is a Professor, Gastroenterology & Liver at Rangpur Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Popular Diagnostic Center, Rangpur. Practicing hour of Prof. Dr. Noor Islam at Popular Diagnostic Center, Rangpur is 7pm to 10pm (Closed: Tuesday & Friday).

doctor.name: Dr. Jimma Hossain
doctor.info: Dr. Jimma Hossain is a Gastroenterologist in Rangpur. His qualification is MBBS, MD (Gastroenterology), Fellow (India). He is a Associate Professor, Gastroenterology at Rangpur Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Popular Diagnostic Center, Rangpur. Practicing hour of Dr. Jimma Hossain at Popular Diagnostic Center, Rangpur is 4pm to 9pm (Sat to Thu) & 10am to 12pm (Fri).

doctor.name: Dr. Khondoker Monirul Alam Russel
doctor.info: Dr. Khondoker Monirul Alam Russel is a Medicine Specialist & Gastro Liver Specialist in Rangpur. His qualification is MBBS, BCS (Health), FCPS (Medicine), FCPS (Gastroenterology). He is a Consultant, Gastroenterology Department at Rangpur Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Ideal Health City, Rangpur. Practicing hour of Dr. Khondoker Monirul Alam Russel at Ideal Health City, Rangpur is 3pm to 9pm (Closed: Friday).
